posts.title: Uses of the spread operator in JavaScript.
posts.body: Shallow Copying Arrays and Objects, Merging Arrays and Objects, Unpacking Arrays and Objects.

posts.title: In JavaScript, === and == are comparison operators used to compare values.
posts.body: `===` is the strict equality operator that checks for both value and type equality, while `==` is the equality operator that allows type coercion and only checks for value equality.
